extracted_playbook.title: Download and Apply Patch for BMXNOR0200H
extracted_playbook.description: Download version SV1.70IR26 of BMXNOR0200H, which includes a fix for the vulnerability, and apply it using appropriate patching methodologies.

extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate Patch Impact
extracted_playbook.description: Evaluate the impact of the patch in a testing and development environment, or on an offline infrastructure.

extracted_playbook.title: Set Up Network Segmentation and Firewall
extracted_playbook.description: Set up network segmentation and implement a firewall to block all unauthorized access to FTP Port 21/TCP on the devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable FTP Service
extracted_playbook.description: Disable FTP service via EcoStruxureTM Control Expert. This is disabled by default when a new application is created.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Web Server Service
extracted_playbook.description: Disable Web server service via EcoStruxureTM Control Expert. This is disabled by default when a new application is created.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Access Control List
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the Access Control List following the recommendation on the 'Modicon Controllers System Cybersecurity'.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Physical Security Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Install physical controls to prevent unauthorized personnel from accessing industrial control and safety systems, components, peripheral equipment, and networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Place Controllers in Locked Cabinets
extracted_playbook.description: Place all controllers in locked cabinets and never leave them in the 'Program' mode.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Mobile Data Exchange Methods
extracted_playbook.description: Scan all methods of mobile data exchange with the isolated network such as CDs, USB drives, etc. before use in the terminals or any node connected to these networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Sanitize Mobile Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure mobile devices that have connected to any other network besides the intended network are sanitized before connecting to the safety or control networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and systems and ensure that they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods, such as virtual private networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available.
